version_description:
1.0.6 Update

1. Bug when the enemy became invulnerable after the shooting down of the helmet from his head is fixed.

2. Added the overall game statistics which show:

- The maximum score
- The number of headshots
- The number of headshots in a row
- The number of hits on apples
- The number of arrows
- The accuracy of the archer
- The number of deaths
- The number of killed enemies
- The amount of money for the whole game

3. "Game Over" panel in single player is modified. Statistics per game and the number of earned money are added.

4. Reward for headshot is increased.

5. PVP game for two people on the same screen is added.

Update 1.1.0

Bugs fixed
Improved performance for Ipad

Update 1.1.0

Bugs fixed
Improved performance for Ipad

Update 1.1.0

Bugs fixed
Improved performance for Ipad

Update 1.1.1

Helmets can now hit several arrows
Added 2 new arrows
Added 3 new shields for archer
Added 4 new enemies
The game is optimized for tablets with a 4 to 3 aspect ratio
Fixed other small bugs

Update 1.1.2
- if the player has a complete HP and he hit an apple, then he is given 5 coins
- returned real time multiplayer

Update 1.3.6:
- Added campaign for 100 levels;
- Added new opponents;
- reduced damage to the legs of opponents;
- changed user interface graphics;
- fixed bugs.

Update 1.3.0:
- added two new enemies;
- spears are added;
- added shurikens;
- Some bugs fixed;

Update 1.4.0:
Added a new season (+100 levels);
Increased fire and poison damage;
Fixed the bug when it didn't give 300 stars;
Added armor, new weapons and equipment;
Player skills added;
Added player inventory;
Improved interface;
In player versus player mode, you can now select equipment;
Fixed other bugs.

- reduced loading time between scenes;
- fixed the accuracy calculation of the "Eye of Nightmares" weapon.
